Title: The Hot Tub
Plot: George picks up a bad habit from some visiting baseball officials. During the time of the New York City Marathon, Elaine has an out of country runner as her house guest. The runner had overslept and missed the big race at the last Olympics and Jerry obsesses with ensuring that it doesn't happen again. Kramer gets a hot tub from his friend Lomez and Elaine has writer's block.
GuestStars: Larry David, Richard Herd, Jeremiah Birkett, Leon Russom, Ernie Lively, Charles Cyphers, Kate Mulligan, Susan Isaacs, Thom Barry, Jeff Miller
